alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Burleson; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 10 at 2:01AM CDT until August 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF THE BRAZOS VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Burleson, Brazos and Washington. * TIMING...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM CDT this evening. * WINDS...South around 15 mph with higher gusts. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Afternoon values of 25-30%.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential.
